posts.post_title: FS - T206 Walter Johnson Portrait P150 - SGC 3.5
posts.post_content: For Sale - Extremely sharp T206 Walter Johnson Portrait Piedmont 150 - SGC 3.  $4500 venmo no fee or $4655 pp gs.  Price includes priority shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  NC residents add 6.5% ST.
